snippet: SUSSMAN--Marvin, JD. The Board of Alumnae Association of the Mount Sinai Hospital School of Nursing is saddened by the passing of Marvin Sussman, JD who tirelessly gave of his time serving as counsel and friend to the Alumnae Association for more than 40 years. Phyllis Shanley Hansell EdD, RN, FNAP, FAAN President and Members of the Board Alumnae Association of the Mount Sinai Hospital School of Nursing 1/3
lead_paragraph: SUSSMAN--Marvin, JD. The Board of Alumnae Association of the Mount Sinai Hospital School of Nursing is saddened by the passing of Marvin Sussman, JD who tirelessly gave of his time serving as counsel and friend to the Alumnae Association for more than 40 years. Phyllis Shanley Hansell EdD, RN, FNAP, FAAN President and Members of the Board Alumnae Association of the Mount Sinai Hospital School of Nursing 1/3
